## RichText.edit() method

Don't use edit directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the RichText type as the return value is to provide the RichText interface to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
edit(fromIdx: number, toIdx: number, content: string, attributes?: {
        [key: string]: string;
    }): RichText;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fromIdx | number |  |
|  toIdx | number |  |
|  content | string |  |
|  attributes | { \[key: string\]: string; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RichText](./yorkie-js-sdk.richtext.md)
